title: Custom Game Creation Slog
body:
Dear Rito

I'm loving the new launcher, but like any new launch, it comes with its setbacks.
Most specifically, the slog involved in creating a custom game right now, to try out my new champions etc.

Every time you add a bot, there's a delay, then you have to manually change their difficulty one by one, creating yet another (seemingly) unnecessary pause each time, and then you have to find the next bot, as changing their difficulty juggles their slots around.

Try it yourself:) Create a custom game and fill it with intermediate bots. It's a slog. Even making their slots not juggle around would make a big difference.
Every bit of streamlining makes league a bit more sleek and professional. It seems a minor complaint but I think we can all agree the more intuitive and seamless every thing is the better for League.

Regards, 
Your humble whiny fan.

replies.body:
I just tested this out and was able to reproduce the *slog* that you mentioned. This definitely doesn't seem intended, but it is a Beta Client, meaning our teams are always on the hunt for bugs or weird interactions. I strongly recommend reposting this report to our [**Client Discussions Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) so the team members that work on the new client may see it.

If you have any other questions, hit me up.
